title: Lonely Lunch
caption: Bullying hurts. It isolates. It silences. Speak up. Stand up. Be kind.
prompt: A single student sitting alone at a lunch table in a bustling school cafeteria. The student appears withdrawn and sad. Use muted colors and soft lighting to convey loneliness. Focus on the student's facial expression.

title: Digital Shadows
caption: Cyberbullying leaves scars. It follows you everywhere. Don't let it control you. Reach out for help.
prompt: A smartphone screen displaying hurtful messages. The light from the phone casts a long, distorted shadow of a person on the wall behind it. Use a dark and unsettling color palette.

title: The Upstander's Choice
caption: One act of courage can change everything. Be an upstander, not a bystander. Your voice matters.
prompt: Two figures stand facing each other. One figure is larger and casts a shadow over the smaller figure. A third figure stands slightly apart, observing. The light shines brightly on the observing figure, highlighting their potential for action.

title: Words as Weapons
caption: Words can wound. Choose them wisely. Build each other up, don't tear each other down.
prompt: Floating words, some appearing sharp and jagged like shards of glass, surrounding a person. Some words should be positive and supportive, while others are negative and hurtful. Use contrasting colors to highlight the difference.

title: A Hand Reaches Out
caption: You're not alone. There's always someone who cares. Don't be afraid to ask for help. Hope is always there.
prompt: A shadowy figure is hunched over, head in their hands. A single hand reaches out towards them, offering support. The hand is brightly lit, contrasting with the darkness surrounding the figure.

title: Breaking the Cycle
caption: Bullying can be stopped. It starts with awareness. It ends with action. Be part of the solution.
prompt: A chain made of interlocking links, representing a cycle of bullying. One of the links is broken, with light shining through the gap. Use a metallic texture for the chain and a bright, optimistic color for the light.

title: Building Bridges
caption: Empathy is key. Understanding each other creates connection. Build bridges, not walls.
prompt: Two hands reaching towards each other, forming a bridge over a gap. The background on either side of the gap represents different perspectives or backgrounds. Use warm and inviting colors.

title: The Power of Kindness
caption: A single act of kindness can make a difference. Spread kindness like confetti. It's contagious.
prompt: A person scattering confetti, which transforms into flowers as it falls. The flowers are bright and vibrant, creating a positive and uplifting atmosphere.

title: Safe Space
caption: Create a safe space. A place where everyone feels valued. A place where everyone belongs.
prompt: A group of diverse individuals gathered together in a circle, smiling and interacting positively. The background is warm and inviting, with soft lighting and comfortable furnishings.
